articles.author: Michael R. Sisak
articles.title: Rory McIlroy calls out 'unacceptable and abusive behavior' from Bethpage fans at Ryder Cup - AP News
articles.description: Rory McIlroy helped Europe win the Ryder Cup and then called out the hostile New York crowd for “unacceptable and abusive behavior.” Over his five matches at Bethpage Black, McIlroy endured a torrent of insults about everything from his personal life to past …
articles.content:
FARMINGDALE, N.Y. (AP) Rory McIlroy helped Europe win the Ryder Cup and then called out the hostile New York crowd for unacceptable and abusive behavior.
Over his five matches at Bethpage Black, McI… [+5376 chars]
